Our global platform allows customers to place infrastructure wherever they need it and connect it to everything they need to succeed.We are a fast-growing global company with 20 years of continuous growth. Through our innovative portfolio of high-performance products and services, we have created the largest, most active global ecosystem of 10,000+ companies, including 2,100 networks and 3,000+ cloud and IT service providers in 32 countries spanning six continents.  Joining our operations team means that you will be at the forefront of all we do, maintaining critical facilities infrastructure as part of a close-knit team delivering best-in-class service to our data center customers. 1. Melakukan input data
Input data merupakan salah satu tugas fundamental seorang admin kantor. Input data ini adalah cara perusahaan untuk mengolah data/informasi yang dikumpulkan—baik dalam bentuk formulir, dokumen, non-dokumen, atau dalam bentuk lainnya, lalu mengolahnya menjadi bentuk dokumen.
2. Mengelola dokumen kantor
Dokumen adalah aset penting bagi perusahaan. Karenanya, perlu seseorang yang bisa dipercaya dan memiliki kemampuan untuk mengelola dokumen perusahaan dengan baik.

About Jiva:Jiva is a venture incubated by OIam in late 2020 with a mission to transform smallholder farming and improve the lives of farmerIt provides four key services:  Offtake services: Direct procurement from farmers with transparency in prices and reliability in operations Input eCommerce: Sales of Agri inputs directly to farmers as well as to village-level entrepreneurs/retailers while improving the availability of products and creditsCredit services: Credit as a service to farmers, input retailers, and crop collectors for buying inputs and paying farmers in timeAdvisory platform: To educate farmers on best practices for growing their crops based on weather conditions and information like location, seed type, sowing date, etc. Jiva is focused on smallholder farmers as we believe they are key to the future of agriculture, humanity & the planet; however they face significant challenges:500 million smallholder farmers globally support over 2 billion people within their families. Yet they comprise the majority of the world’s poorest peopleSmallholder farmers produce 70% of the world’s food. Yet they comprise the world’s most undernourished, hungry populationThey are the most vulnerable to climate change which threatens up to 25% of crop yields Since starting operations in Q1 2021, Jiva has worked with over 40k smallholder farmers in Indonesia to procure over 150,000 MT of corn. We are looking to exponentially grow our input eCommerce business to over USD 100 Mn business in the next 3 years.  About Olam:Olam International is a leading food and agri-business supplying food, ingredients, feed, and fiber to over 19,800 customers worldwide. Our value chain spans over 60 countries and includes farming, processing, and distribution operations, as well as a sourcing network of 4.8 million farmers. Through its purpose to ‘Re-imagine Global Agriculture and Food Systems, Olam aims to address the many challenges involved in meeting the needs of a growing global population, while achieving a positive impact on farming communities, our planet, and all our stakeholders. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, Olam currently ranks among the top 30 largest primary listed companies in market capitalization on SGX-ST. About this opportunity:We are looking for an exceptional Fulfillment Executive, who is passionate about our mission, to lead the fulfillment of the Agri-Inputs e-Commerce business of Jiva Indonesia. The role will be based out of East Java, reporting directly to the National Fulfillment Manager. The venture is backed by Olam International, which has an unparalleled presence in rural communities and relationships with millions of smallholder farmers. It is uniquely positioned to drive profit with purpose: disrupting the agriculture industry and generating outsized financial returns, while creating a real impact for some of the world’s poorest farmers and their families, and the planet by promoting sustainable farming practices. What Jiva offers:Shape an entire Fulfillment line of startup and product in its early stage of growthMake a real difference in the lives of farmers, humanity, and our planetExperience an international adventure in frontier markets as this venture scales beyond Singapore, Indonesia, India, and across Asia and AfricaJoin a talented, passionate, and fun team from across the globeA diverse and inclusive environment with colleagues from around the worldCompetitive compensation and benefits (including base, bonus, and stock options)Upsides of a rapidly growing startup, with the financial security and strategic advantage of a global corporate backing What you will do:Work with fulfillment center (product management) to build and implement an improvement plan to meet critical warehouse and business needsDevelop a thorough, effective, and timely continuous improvement plan to meet our effectiveness & productivity targetsLead Kaizen events and other activities that execute the improvement plansProvide regular KPI reports with data and actions to measure progress against the plan objectivesWork with our IT & product team to design features that will help deliver the required productivity improvementsTrain Warehouse leadership and other key personnel on Lean conceptsDevelop shop floor experts capable of driving Lean & 5S in their areasMaintain a detailed understanding of Lean & 5S best practices, and share best practices and knowledge with the regional team. Who we are looking for:Extensive and proven experience of 5+ years in fulfillment of e-commerce (Agri inputs eCommerce experience will be an added plus)Extensive experience in a leadership role in the fulfillment of e-commerceStrong data analysis skills and knowledge of Microsoft ExcelHighly energetic and self-motivatedResults driven-focus on operations & scaleDemonstrated ability to handle multiple tasks, prioritize those tasks, and meet deadlinesAn articulate communicator with highly developed presentation and interpersonal skillsFluent and excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Bahasa are required

The Automation Lead Engineer is responsible for overseeing the efficient operation and maintenance of the BMS and BAS infrastructure within the data center facility, ensuring optimal performance and reliability of critical systems. They will lead a team of technicians, manage system upgrades and expansions, monitor environmental conditions, and develop strategies for energy efficiency and cost savings.Client DetailsWe are currently partnering with one of the leading multinational data center companies who is looking for a competent Automation Lead Engineer to help them with their expansion in Indonesia.DescriptionGood record of BMS project management, BMS designing, IOT understanding. Provide electrical design for a wide range of projects, and work with other engineers, project managers, and construction professionals as needed.Design and install electrical and BMS control system to meet refrigeration system requirements in projects. With an eye of details for continuous improvement.Having knowledge of IT infrastructure.Familiar with local design code for Electrical and Control system design.Working knowledge of building energy management systems. Has good understanding of data center efficiency & Controls; but not limited to BMS Control, pneumatic controls, mechanical Control systems, lighting controls, access control and backup emergency systems for efficient functioning of Data centers.Working knowledge on field instrumentation such as temperature, pressure, and flow devices typically connected to an automation system.Ability to diagnose, repair, and return all automation systems to efficient operation condition.Capable of working out in the field and perform troubleshooting of BMS controller & IO devices. Capability to proactively identifying SPOF's and suggest improvements to the existing BMS system to reduce BMS-related system failures, and to improve the efficiency of the building.Maintain advanced technical skills with solid workings of Automation Platforms.Review and understand the project documents, BMS submission and Validation of the technical specification.Ensure best installation practice to the field team, to ensure the control system installation standards of quality are always maintained and improved. Also, Develop and oversee all aspects of installation including electrical installation, control system, selection of components, equipment, installation method, testing, and implementation of the Refrigeration / HVAC systems.Ensure project expectations are always effectively communicated to the customers and project stakeholders in a clear and concise fashion.Willing to learn, accept opportunity for creative design with strong theoretical knowledge for commercial and industrial Refrigeration / HVAC projects.Should have quick decision-making capability to overcome a site incident with minimal downtime.Should have good technical and Interpersonal skills, good judgement, clear communication skills, self-driven and ability to help others.Knowledge on digital Twin will be an added advantage.Knowledge about calculating the building load and designing BMS structure to reduce the PUE of the Data center.ProfileBachelor Degree in Engineering in Automation, Instrumentation, Electrical Engineering, or related fields preferred.A minimum of 8 years as an Automation Engineer, Commissioning Engineer, or BMS design Engineer or equivalent in a Data center related work environment, or a combination of education, service, and/or practical work experience.3- 7 years of relevant facilities maintenance, Project management, BMS commissioning and repair experience in a commercial, Data center or industrial setting.Knowledge on networking with understanding of redundant BMS architecture.Experience with data center equipment/environments, including switch gears, generators, chillers, cooling towers, air handling units, controls, security monitoring systems, fire safety systems, and an understanding of start-up /commissioning processes preferred.Focus with the ability to handle multiple assignments in a fast-paced environment. With eye for details; and has done troubleshooting of BMS / IBMS systems in a live system.Hands-on experience in Data center operation, Design and projects.Good interpersonal skills including good verbal and written communication in English.Job OfferGreat career prospects as the growth opportunity in the company is tremendous.The chance to really impact the decisions of a very successful business and input into process, procedures & systems.To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Veny Adilia on +62 21 2958 8846.

Menganalisis data: sekalipun perusahaan tempat kamu bekerja memiliki data analyst, tapi seorang business analyst biasanya ikut mengumpulkan dan menganalisis data bisnis untuk mengidentifikasi pola atau tren tertentu.
Menganalisis kebutuhan bisnis: dengan melakukan analisis yang mendalam, seorang business analyst akan mengidentifikasi syarat-syarat bisnis atau yang dibutuhkan, seperti anggaran, serta mengusulkan solusi untuk memenuhi kebutuhan-kebutuhan tersebut.
Menganalisis proses bisnis: business analyst juga akan mengevaluasi proses bisnis yang sudah dilakukan, serta menentukan kelemahan maupun kelebihan dari proses tersebut. Kemudian business analyst akan membuat proses baru yang lebih efisien.
Mengidentifikasi risiko dan peluang bisnis: ketika perusahaan ingin membuat kebijakan tertentu, stakeholder akan meminta business analyst untuk meninjau risiko-risiko serta peluang dari kebijakan tersebut. Business analyst juga mungkin akan dimintai rekomendasi terkait kebijakan yang akan dibuat.

Persyaratan minimum:
Tersedia jam fleksibel
Tidak diperlukan pengalaman kerja untuk posisi ini
Pelamar harus memiliki KTP
Tanggal mulai kerja: 18 March 2024
Gaji yang diinginkan: Rp5,000,000 per bulan

Judul Pekerjaan: Business Analyst
Deskripsi Pekerjaan:
Kami sedang mencari seorang Business Analyst yang akan berperan penting dalam mengidentifikasi kebutuhan bisnis dan menemukan solusi yang inovatif. Anda akan bekerja erat dengan tim IT dan stakeholders untuk meningkatkan efisiensi dan kinerja, serta mengimplementasikan teknologi baru yang mendukung tujuan strategis perusahaan.
Tanggung Jawab Utama:

Mengumpulkan, menganalisis, dan mendokumentasikan persyaratan bisnis dari semua departemen terkait.
Menyusun dan memvalidasi solusi bersama tim IT untuk memastikan kebutuhan bisnis terpenuhi.
Melakukan analisis pasar dan kompetitor untuk mendukung strategi bisnis.
Mengembangkan dan memonitor metrik kinerja untuk memastikan bahwa solusi yang diimplementasikan berhasil.
Bekerja lintas fungsi untuk mendukung pengembangan produk dan implementasi proyek.
Menyajikan temuan analisis dan rekomendasi kepada manajemen senior dan pemangku kepentingan.

Kualifikasi:

Gelar Sarjana di bidang Bisnis, Keuangan, Ekonomi, Sistem Informasi, atau bidang terkait.
Pengalaman minimal 2 tahun sebagai Business Analyst, khususnya di industri property dan konstruksi.
Keahlian kuat dalam analisis data dan penggunaan alat analitik seperti SQL, Excel, R, atau Python.
Kemampuan untuk berpikir kritis dan memecahkan masalah secara kompleks.
Komunikasi yang efektif, baik lisan maupun tertulis, dengan kemampuan presentasi yang kuat.
Pengalaman dalam mengelola stakeholder dan proyek lintas fungsi.
Pengetahuan tentang metodologi Agile dan Scrum merupakan nilai tambah.
Mampu bekerja dalam tim maupun secara mandiri.
Memiliki kemampuan adaptasi yang baik dalam lingkungan yang bergerak cepat dan dinamis.

Keterampilan yang Diinginkan:

Sertifikasi profesional seperti CBAP (Certified Business Analysis Professional) atau PMI-PBA (PMI Professional in Business Analysis) merupakan nilai tambah.
Pengalaman dalam penggunaan alat manajemen proyek seperti JIRA atau Asana.
Pengetahuan mendalam tentang industri perusahaan dan tren teknologi terkini.

JOB DESCRIPTIONS:
Engineering is in the blood for artificial intelligence engineer (AI Engineer). An AI engineer develops, trains, tests, and assesses deep learning and machine learning models that carry out prediction tasks in a variety of fields, including computer vision, natural language processing, and others.
We expect you to handle these responsibilities in accordance with the role the company has given to you.

Designing AI/ML system end-to-end from building the model until deployment.
Gathering and preprocessing datasets. 
Build API for model deployment.
Support the non-related Al project.
Willing to get redirect to another role such as backend or frontend developer whenever there is no availability of Al-related project.

REQUIREMENTS:

Hands-on experience in AI/ML projects with minimum 1 year experience (fresh graduates are welcome to apply).
Working knowledge of ML/DL algorithms (classification, regression, clustering, hyperparameter tuning, etc.).
Proficiency with Python is a must and libraries/frameworks for ML/DL such as Scikit-learn, Pandas, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, MXNet, etc. 
Experience building a RESTful API using Flask or Fast API.
Scientific Paper Reader.

PREFERRED:
As an IT Services and Consulting company, we work on a lot of AI-based projects that incorporate hardware like cameras and sensors and other IoT devices, particularly in the healthcare and telecommunications industries. Therefore, we prefer you as an AI Engineer as follows.

Programing skills and competency with Python and C++.
Experience with IoT technologies (e.g., Arduino, sensor).
Relevant experience in cloud technologies working with cloud services platform (AWS or GCP) to build ML/DL pipelines﻿ and model deployment using Docker is a plus.
Experience working with healthcare (insurance, pharmaceutical, sensor, etc.) would be a plus.
Experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD).
Experience with Raspberry Pi.

Persyaratan minimum:
Tersedia jam fleksibel
Diperlukan 2-3 tahun pengalaman kerja yang relevan untuk posisi ini
Pelamar harus memiliki KTP

Senior Manager, Engineering Services – Data Centre LeadAccount Management – Work DynamicsROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIESJob Description:As a Data Center Leader in Indonesia, you will play a critical role in overseeing the site team operations and managing all aspects of data center operations. You will need to have a deep understanding of the data center market in Indonesia, stay up to date with the latest trends and technologies, and be able to effectively liaise with local vendors specific to data center operations.Job Summary:Strategy and Account Management· Ensure that account plans are implemented and aligned with client objectives.· Be accountable for the profit, loss and growth of the assigned portfolio of accounts.· Work with the Account Management Enablement organization to implement the agreed account management practices.· Be accountable for operational risk management and mitigation on the DC accounts in the portfolio.· Work in tandem with DC Operations Vertical to ensure best engineering practices are implemented on the accounts and risk management support extended to the accounts· Client Relationship Management· Proactively drive teams to prepare for all client renewals – striving for off market renewals all the time.· Unlock opportunities for account growth and work with the account team and/or Sales organization to convert these opportunities.· Work with the Sales team on new bids and presentations to achieve the Sales targets. Provide strategic guidance as well as support for bids, presentations and other similar support activities.· Leverage external networks to further sales and business development efforts. Talent Management· Create a high-performing, integrated team who are committed to delivering exceptional client results.· Ensure all accounts have a clear skill management plan particularly for personnel deployed directly in managing and operating critical spaces· Critically analyze account managers’ performance (account based staff and “hosted” account staff) and build feedback into actionable development plans.Account Operations:· Ensure Operational risk for all DC accounts in portfolio is effectively managed and mitigation measure reported out· Work with the HR Business Partners on talent management programs· Work with the Delivery Organization to drive operational excellence, efficiency initiatives, risk management and compliance· Work towards best in class delivery keeping in view rapidly changing environment around work, workplace and technology.· Maintain visibility over the operational compliances and certifications for all client sites; ensuring that appropriate actions are taken by account teams.· Initiate strategies to achieve measurable improvements in energy consumption, in conjunction with the Engineering Manager.· Develop and implement innovative programs and processes that reduce short- and long-term operating costs, increase productivity and increase revenue.· Work together with site team, support a variety of critical business functions including financial, procurement, vendor management, contract management, transportation programs and general office services. Find innovative ways to streamline and enhance service delivery, while keeping an eye on the bottom line.Market Knowledge:· Stay informed about the latest developments, trends, and regulations in the Indonesian data center market.· Conduct regular market research to identify potential opportunities, emerging technologies, and best practices.· Analyse competitor strategies and market dynamics to inform decision-making and maintain a competitive edge.Vendor Management:· Develop and maintain relationships with local vendors specific to data center operations, such as power suppliers, HVAC contractors, security providers, and maintenance service companies.· Negotiate service agreements, pricing, and contracts with vendors to ensure optimal service levels are maintained within budget.· Manage vendor performance, conduct regular audits, and resolve any escalations or disputes.Compliance and Risk Management:· Ensure compliance with all applicable regulations, standards, and certifications related to data center operations.· Implement and maintain robust operation processes, security protocols, including access control, surveillance systems Emergency Operation procedures, and disaster recovery procedures.· Conduct regular risk assessments, develop mitigation plans, and ensure business continuity in the event of emergencies or disruptions.Stakeholder Communication:· Collaborate with internal stakeholders, such as IT teams, engineering teams, and business unit leaders, to align data center operations with organizational goals and strategies.· Communicate effectively with senior management by providing regular updates on data center performance, key metrics, and any significant issues or developments.Requirement:· Bachelor's degree in computer science, electrical engineering, or a related field.· Minimum 10 years proven experience in data center operations, preferably in a leadership role.· Strong knowledge of data center infrastructure, electrical systems, cooling technologies, and security protocols.· Familiarity with local regulations, market dynamics, and vendors in the Indonesian data center industry.· Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively liaise with internal and external stakeholders.· Ability to lead, motivate, and manage a team effectively.· Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to handle multiple priorities and meet deadlines.· Attention to detail and a commitment to maintaining the highest standards of operational excellence.

About MAKAMotorsMAKA is dedicated to building the best electric motorcycles for Indonesian riders, driven by top-notch local engineering and craftsmanship. We believe that motorcycles are more than just a mode of transportation in Indonesia—they’re a way of life. That’s why we’re committed to accelerating the country’s electrification efforts with motorcycles that are specifically designed for the unique needs of Indonesian riders.Our goal is simple: to create the best motorcycles possible—made by Indonesians, for Indonesians.About the challengeAre you passionate about the world of data engineering and adept at managing data infrastructure? Do you possess a proven track record of translating data strategies into robust engineering solutions? If you're known for your technical expertise and your ability to design and implement data pipelines, you could be the ideal candidate for us!As a Data Engineer Specialist at MAKA Motors, you will be held accountable for ensuring and guarantee the data that used is always in high reliable, recorded, safe and secure. Your role will involve close collaboration with cross-functional teams, ensuring data engineering aligns with our data-driven organizational goals.Is this you?A bachelor's degree in Informatics, Computer Science, Information Systems, Software Engineering, or a related field.A minimum of 5 years of practical experience in Data Engineering, demonstrating a deep understanding of data management and engineering principles.Proficiency in a range of programming languages, including C, C#, Python, Java, and SQL, to effectively work with and manipulate data.Familiarity with server systems, cloud servers, and mobile platforms (Android/iOS) to support data engineering activities and adapt to different data environments.Strong work ethic and a passion for delivering high-quality results. Demonstrated respect from peers and colleagues, and a willingness to collaborate across departments or divisions to achieve the company's goals, reflecting a team-oriented mindset. What a day at work for you will look likeDevelop and implement a comprehensive data engineering strategy that includes creating tools, structures, and methods for manufacturing data. Ensure the strategy aligns with the company's data standards and best practices.Implement rigorous data quality assurance processes, including strict adherence to Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), technology and tools quality inspections, and staying updated with quality data trends to ensure that data meets Maka's standards.Take charge of data security by establishing robust measures to safeguard sensitive information. Ensure data compliance with relevant regulations and internal policies.Design and maintain data systems that enable efficient traceability of data for after-sales support and quality response time. Ensure data retrieval, transfer, backup, and storage are well-organized and accessible.Oversee the maintenance of server systems to support data engineering activities, ensuring that they run smoothly and efficiently.

Job Descreption
1. Merancang dan mengembangkan sistem CRM yang sesuai dengan kebutuhan Perusahaan, bisa menggunakan metode manual atau dengan berbagai tools seperti Google Spreadsheet, Omnichannel, dll 
2. Mengumpulkan, menyimpan, dan menganalisis data pelanggan untuk mengidentifikasi tren dan pola yang berguna dalam meningkatkan layanan pelanggaan (User & Mitra).

Sekilas Tentang PerusahaanPT Sarana Yukti Bandhana (SYB) adalah penyedia dan operator sistem pembayaran. Selama lebih dari 20 tahun, SYB telah merintis ekosistem pembayaran digital yang menjamin transaksi diproses secara efisien dan aman.SYB menawarkan beragam saluran pembayaran digital, melayani berbagai sektor, mulai dari utilitas public, perbankan, keuangan, asuransi, pendidikan, telekomunikasi, hiburan, game online, e-commerce, sampai e-wallet dan e-money.Kami berusaha keras untuk menjadi pelopor di ranah digital dan memberikan pelanggan kami solusi keuangan yang aman dan inovatif, dirancang untuk memajukan jasa keuangan di seluruh Asia. Ringkasan PeranSebagai Business Process Management Analyst  untuk proyek sales corporate, Anda akan melapor ke Business Process Manager dan peran Anda akan mencakupi hal-hal berikut ini:Manajemen Proyek: Mengawasi alur kerja dan proyek tim Sales. Mengkoordinasi dan mengelola semua fase proyek untuk memastikan penyelesaian proyek tepat waktu dan sesuai dengan tujuan yang ditetapkan.Mengawasi Alur Kerja: Kolaborasi dengan tim-tim lintas departemen guna memastikan kordinasi yang mulus untuk semua rencana dan proyek. Mengadakan rapat secara reguler dengan tim sales, hukum dan information technology (IT) guna mengawasi progresnya proyek dan menjawab semua pertanyaan dan potensi challenge.Analisis Strategis dan Manajemen Risiko: Melakukan analisa strategis untuk setiap proyek, mengidentifikasi potensi risiko dan isu menyangkut proyek yang ditangani, mengembangkan strategi mitigasi risiko dan masalah, mengeskalasi isu-isu kritis dan berkolaborasi dengan pihak intern untuk menerapkan solusi terbaik agar proyek tetap berjalan pada jalurnya.Dokumentasi dan Pelaporan: Mereview progres harian, laporan status harian dan dokumentasi proyek yang dibuat oleh tim Sales serta memastikan semua dokumentasi hukum dan teknis sudah sesuai.Monitoring Target & Transaksi Sales: Melakukan monitoring secara berkala & analisa data untuk review peraihan target sales.Riset & Laporan Penelitian: Menyusun laporan penelitian yang menyatukan temuan qualitatif maupun quantitatif.Sistem Manajemen Mutu: Mendukung dan berpartisipasi dalam upaya organisasi untuk mempertahankan standar internasional untuk keamanan informasi dan sistem manajemen mutu agar sesuai dengan persyaratan ISO 9001 dan ISO 27001.Kualifikasi & Keahlian yang dibutuhkanPendidikan: Minimal S1Pengalaman Kerja: Lulusan baru atau pengalaman kerja minimal 2 tahun. Akan lebih baik apabila memiliki pengalaman di industri pembayaran, namun tidak menjadi keharusan.Domisili: Berdomisili di DKI Jakarta.Ketersediaan: Dapat mulai bekerja sesegera mungkin dan bersedia bekerja di lokasi kantor pusat perusahaan di Jakarta.Bahasa Indonesia & Inggris: Mampu menulis dan berbicara dalam bahasa Indonesia dan bahasa Inggris. Keahlian Manajemen Proyek: Memiliki keahlian tinggi dalam mengelola proyek, mengatur waktu dan mengendalikan disrupsi agar proyek selesai tepat waktu dengan mutu yang tinggi.Keahlian Riset & Penelitian: Sanggup menghasilkan penelitian level institusi & showcase, memiliki attitude yang proaktif menghadapi dan mengikuti perkembangan & tren terkini.Analisis Data: Mampu mengevaluasi data dan melakukan analisis transaksi.Microsoft Office: Mahir dalam Microsoft Office Word, Excel, dan PowerPoint. Etos Kerja: Memiliki etos kerja yang kuat, mandiri dan memiliki integritas tinggi. Mampu beradaptasi dengan lingkungan kerja yang cepat, mampu menangani deadline, dan permintaan pekerjaan ad-hoc dengan cepat.Keahlian Berkomunikasi: Memfasilitasi komunikasi yang jelas dan efektif guna memumpuk pengertian dan alignment diantara stakeholder berbeda.Berorientasi pada Detail: Mampu menyusun dokumentasi proyek yang komprehensif dengan teliti dan secara konsisten. BenefitKami melakukan investasi dalam personnel kami, serta perkembangan karir & kesejahteraan. Berikut adalah benefit yang kami berikan:Tunjangan layanan kesehatanTunjangan TelekomunikasiKebijakan cuti keluargaPelatihan karyawan yang komprehensifTim yang kolaboratif dan berketerampilan tinggiLingkungan kerja yang kondusif____________________________________________________________________________________________________Company OverviewPT Sarana Yukti Bandhana (SYB) is a payment systems provider and operator. For more than 20 years, SYB has pioneered a digital payment ecosystem that ensures transactions are processed in a streamlined and secure manner.SYB offers a diverse array of digital payment channels, serving a myriad of sectors, ranging from public utilities, banking, finance, insurance, education, telecommunication, entertainment, online gaming, e-commerce, to e-wallet and e-money.We strive to be on the vanguard of the digital landscape and provide our customers with sound and innovative financial solutions, tailored to advance financial services across Asia.Roles OverviewAs an Business Process Management Analyst for corporate projects, you will report to the Business Process Manager and your role will encompass the following:Project Management: Overseeing workstreams and projects held by Corporate Sales personnel. Coordinating and managing all phases of the project life cycle to ensure on-time completion and alignment with the set goals and objectives.Overseeing Workstreams: Collaborate with cross-departmental teams to ensure smooth coordination of activities, timelines and resources. Assess and ensure all legal and technical documentation are in order for all new and existing projects.Sales Target & Transaction Monitoring: Conduct regular transaction monitoring and synthesize data to assess transaction performance. Evaluate and present data to review sales target achievements. Draft Research Reports: Compose research reports related to existing and/or potential business streams that synthesize findings derived from both qualitative and quantitative data.Quality Management Systems: Support and participate in the organization's efforts to maintain an international standard for information security and quality management systems (QMS) to conform with the ISO 9001 and ISO 27001 requirements.Qulification & Skills Required Education: Bachelor degree holder in any discipline. Work Experience: Fresh graduate or has minimal work experience of 2 years. Experience in the payments industry would be ideal, but is not mandatory.Domicile: Domiciled in DKI Jakarta.Availability: Able to commence work as soon as possible and willing to work on-site in the Jakarta headquarters.Language Skills: Native written and spoken Indonesian and intermediate English skills.Project Management Skills: Strong organizational and time management skills, with an ability to manage disruptions and a track record for delivering projects on time with optimum quality. Research Skills: Able to produce institutional grade research and showcase a proactive attitude towards staying abreast with emerging trends. Data Analysis: Able to evaluate and synthesize data sets and conduct performance and/or transaction analysis.Microsoft Office Tools: Proficient in Microsoft Office tools, such as Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel and Microsoft PowerPoint.Work Ethic: Demonstrates a strong work ethic, self-driven and possesses a high degree of integrity. Able to adapt to a fast-paced work environment, manage multiple deadlines and respond to ad-hoc work requests quickly. Communication Skills: Facilitate clear and effective communication to foster synergy and align the objectives among different stakeholders.Detail Oriented: Able to develop and maintain comprehensive project documentation with consistency and a high degree of attention of detail. BenefitsWe invest in our people, their career development and their well-being. Job Title: elv (extra low voltage) electrical engineer - construction data center
Job Description: Job Responsibilities：(1) Planning1. Participate in the review of EV drawings, collect professional opinions related to EV, and implement rectification opinions.2. Responsible for the collection of technical specifications and standards related to EV engineering, and responsible for the application, promotion and control of new processes and technologies in the EV profession.3. Review the design change applications for EV majors, organize feasibility studies of major design changes, and urge the design institute to complete design changes on time.4. Participate in and assist in handling relevant procedures required before construction.(2) Under construction1. EV engineers are responsible for the control of project progress and construction quality within the scope of their profession. Handle technical and quality issues during construction.2. Confirm design changes, handle construction technical issues, and handle engineering technical negotiations.3. Coordinate issues such as site, construction water, electricity and schedule coordination among various construction teams.4. Supervise the supervision company to supervise construction quality, daily inspections, participate in dead-point inspections, concealed acceptance, intermediate acceptance and completion acceptance. Handle quality incidents.5. Supervise and coordinate the safety production, fire prevention, theft prevention and civilized construction work of the construction unit.6. Supervise the pre-embedding and reservation work to ensure accuracy.7. Coordinate the cross-construction of various professional construction teams to ensure that the project is completed on time and in quantity within the construction period.(3) Acceptance1. Participate in the post-completion acceptance of the project and raise issues and areas for improvement based on your own professional standards.2. Participate in handover matters of weak current intelligent and handover matters with owners.3. Participate in the training of owner operation and maintenance personnel. Job Requirements:1. Bachelor degree or above, graduated in electrical, automation, communications and other related majors;2. Proficient in weak current and intelligent systems of office building projects;3. More than 5 years of experience in the construction and management of weak current systems in large public construction projects; Experience in data center project delivery is preferred4. Have a strong sense of responsibility, be rigorous and careful in doing things, and have strong communication, coordination and problem-solving abilities;5. Willing to be placed in Cikarang Area.

Job Title: data annotators - flexible work & unlimited income opportunities – join us now!
Job Description: Data Annotators play a pivotal role in shaping the excellence of Machine Learning (ML) and AI systems. By meticulously identifying entities, classifying data, and validating model outputs in extensive textual datasets, data annotators ensure the precision and reliability of the data fueling ML algorithms. These experts are essential navigators in the realm of AI, contributing to the overall accuracy and efficiency of systems that rely on recurrent patterns and specific entities.We are seeking a meticulous and organized Data Annotator for a 3-month contract each time which is potentially extendable to 1 year. In this role, you will collaborate with our data science team and play a vital part in handling large textual data sets. Your primary responsibilities will include identifying and labeling data in various entities:Image AnnotationVideo AnnotationVoice AnnotationText Annotation3D Point Cloud AnnotationAutomatic AnnotationData ValidationResponsibilities:Execute the identification and labeling of data across various entities.Categorize documents into diverse classifications.Validate the outcomes produced by Machine Learning models.Discern recurring patterns within datasets.Ensure precision and reliability in the process of data annotation.Requirements:Minimum of a high school degree or above.Personals who have a passion and experience of playing PC games are preferred.Highly adept at navigating a PC/laptop with proficient skills in utilizing both keyboard and mouse.Basic proficiency in English.Exhibit a high level of reliability and meticulous attention to detail.Capable of efficiently handling repetitive tasks with consistent quality.Showcase solid organizational skills.Ability to work independently and effectively. Explore a dynamic opportunity and elevate your career by joining us as a Data Annotator. Dive into the world of part-time flexibility, where your computer and internet connection become the tools for a dynamic work experience. In this role, your fee is tied to your output – with no income limitation as long as quality is maintained. Your attention to detail will shine as your meticulous examination and categorization of large datasets will be the driving force behind shaping the future of machine learning. Your commitment to accurate labeling and organization will play a key role and directly impact the effectiveness of training and refining machine learning models, making your role indispensable in the realm of data science.

Sekilas Tentang PerusahaanPT Sarana Yukti Bandhana (SYB) adalah penyedia dan operator sistem pembayaran. Selama lebih dari 20 tahun, SYB telah merintis ekosistem pembayaran digital yang menjamin transaksi diproses secara efisien dan aman.SYB menawarkan beragam saluran pembayaran digital, melayani berbagai sektor, mulai dari utilitas public, perbankan, keuangan, asuransi, pendidikan, telekomunikasi, hiburan, game online, e-commerce, sampai e-wallet dan e-money.Kami berusaha keras untuk menjadi pelopor di ranah digital dan memberikan pelanggan kami solusi keuangan yang aman dan inovatif, dirancang untuk memajukan jasa keuangan di seluruh Asia. Ringkasan Peran Sebagai Market Research Analyst, Anda akan melapor ke Business Process Manager dan peran Anda akan mencakup hal-hal berikut:Draft Laporan Penelitian: Menyusun laporan penelitian yang mensintesis temuan yang berasal dari data kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Kelola peringatan penelitian ad-hoc dan dukung pembaruan bulanan lintas tim mengenai tren komersial yang relevan.Mempresentasikan Temuan Penelitian kepada Pemangku Kepentingan Senior: Mempersiapkan dan menyajikan presentasi penelitian pada pertemuan rutin bagi pemangku kepentingan senior untuk memberikan wawasan tentang pasar, memahami implikasi kebijakan, memandu penelitian strategis dan mendukung proses pengambilan keputusan strategis organisasi.Analisis Pasar yang Komprehensif: Menganalisis tren pasar, peluang dan risiko dalam industri pembayaran.Analisis Data Keuangan: Mengevaluasi data keuangan, termasuk pendapatan, biaya, dan profitabilitas, untuk mendukung temuan penelitian kualitatif.Menerjemahkan Laporan : Menerjemahkan laporan berita dari Bahasa Indonesia ke Bahasa Inggris dan memberikan rangkuman secara berkala.Berkolaborasi dengan Pemangku Kepentingan Internal: Berkolaborasi secara efektif dengan berbagai tim internal untuk mengumpulkan informasi lapangan guna mendukung temuan penelitian.Kualifikasi & Keahlian yang dibutuhkanPendidikan: Minimal S1 , Semua JurusanPengalaman Kerja: Lulusan Baru, atau pengalaman kerja minimal 2 tahun.Domisili: Berdomisili di DKI Jakarta.Ketersediaan: Dapat mulai bekerja sesegera mungkin dan bersedia bekerja di lokasi kantor pusat perusahaan di Jakarta.Bahasa Indonesia & Inggris: Mampu menulis dan berbicara dalam bahasa Indonesia dan bahasa Inggris.Keahlian Riset & Penelitian: Mampu menghasilkan riset berkelas institusional dan menunjukkan sikap proaktif dalam menjaga diri tetap update dengan tren-tren yang muncul.Kemampuan Analitis: Memperlihatkan kemampuan analitis yang kuat dengan kemampuan untuk mensintesis wawasan yang kohesif dari berbagai sumber data. Mampu berpikir secara kritis dan merumuskan strategi untuk mendorong pertumbuhan bisnis.Analisis Keuangan: Kemampuan untuk melakukan evaluasi metrik keuangan dan mahir dalam analisis keuangan.Keterampilan Menulis : Memiliki keterampilan tertulis yang kuat untuk menyampaikan temuan kompleks dengan cara yang jelas dan menonjol. Memiliki keterampilan mengedit yang efektif (misalnya tata bahasa dan tipografi) untuk meningkatkan kualitas publikasi penelitian. Etos Kerja: Memiliki etos kerja yang kuat, mandiri dan memiliki integritas tinggi. Mampu beradaptasi dengan lingkungan kerja yang cepat, mampu menangani deadline, dan permintaan pekerjaan ad-hoc dengan cepat.Berorientasi pada Detail: Mampu menyusun dokumentasi proyek yang komprehensif dengan teliti dan secara konsisten.Microsoft Office: Mahir dalam Microsoft Office Word, Excel, dan PowerPoint.BenefitKami melakukan investasi dalam personnel kami, serta perkembangan karir & kesejahteraan. Berikut adalah benefit yang kami berikan:Tunjangan layanan kesehatanTunjangan TelekomunikasiKebijakan cuti keluargaPelatihan karyawan yang komprehensifTim yang kolaboratif dan berketerampilan tinggiLingkungan kerja yang kondusif ____________________________________________________________________________________________________ Company OverviewPT Sarana Yukti Bandhana (SYB) is a payment systems provider and operator. For more than 20 years, SYB has pioneered a digital payment ecosystem that ensures transactions are processed in a streamlined and secure manner.SYB offers a diverse array of digital payment channels, serving a myriad of sectors, ranging from public utilities, banking, finance, insurance, education, telecommunication, entertainment, online gaming, e-commerce, to e-wallet and e-money.We strive to be on the vanguard of the digital landscape and provide our customers with sound and innovative financial solutions, tailored to advance financial services across Asia. Roles OverviewAs a Market Research Analyst you will report to the Business Process Manager and your role will encompass the following: Draft Research Reports: Compose research reports that synthesize findings derived from both qualitative and quantitative data. Manage ad-hoc research alerts and support monthly cross-team updates on relevant commercial trends.Present Research Findings to Senior Stakeholders: Prepare and present research presentations at regular meetings for senior stakeholders to provide insight into the market, understand policy implications, guide strategic research and support the organization's strategic decision-making process.Comprehensive Market Analysis: Analyze market trends, opportunities and risks within the payments industry.Financial Data Analysis: Evaluate financial data, including revenue, costs, and profitability, to support qualitative research findings.Translate Reports: Translate news reports from Indonesian to English and provide summaries on a regular basis. Collaborate with Internal Stakeholders: Collaborate effectively with various internal teams to garner field information to support research findings. Qulification & Skills RequiredEducation: Bachelor degree holder in any discipline. Work Experience: Fresh Graduate, or has minimal work experience of 2 years.Domicile: Domiciled in Jakarta. Availability: Able to commence work as soon as possible and willing to work on-site in the Jakarta headquarters.Language Skills: Strong written and spoken Indonesian and English skills. Research Skills: Able to produce institutional grade research and showcases a proactive attitude towards staying abreast with emerging trends. Analytical Skills: Demonstrates strong analytical skills with the ability to synthesize cohesive insights from a variety of data sources. Able to think critically and formulate strategies to drive business growth.Financial Analysis: Ability to evaluate financial metrics and is proficient financial analysis. Written Skills: Possesses strong written skills to convey complex findings in a clear and salient manner. Possesses effective editing skills (e.g. grammar and typography) to improve the quality of research publications. Work Ethic: Demonstrates a strong work ethic, self-driven and possess a high degree of integrity. Able to adapt to a fast-paced work environment, manage multiple deadlines and respond to ad-hoc work requests quickly. Detail Oriented: Is conscientious in nature and pays high attention to detail. Microsoft Office Tools: Proficient in Microsoft Office tools, such as Word, Excel and PowerPoint.BenefitsWe invest in our people, their career development and their well-being. We provide the following benefits to our employees:Health care benefitsTelecommunication allowanceFair family leave policiesComprehensive employee trainingCollaborative and highly skilled teamsConducive work environment

Facility: Compliance Analyst
Job Description: ANALYST COMPLIANCE (STOCK TAKING) Some of your duties will include:• Responsible for suggesting enhancements to policies and procedures in the event of reoccurring inventory accuracy within the warehouse group. This position also works in conjunction with internal and external audits groups during site review and compliance testing within warehouse areas.  Compliance Analyst is also responsible to track the issuance, dispatch and incoming receipt of repairable components.• To conduct self-assessment audits to ensure individual warehouses are performing their duties in adherence to established policies and procedures.• To perform physical inventory cyclic stocktaking at all warehouse locations.• To monitor warehouse operations areas to ensure adherence to policies and procedures.• To audit document control within the warehouse data input area.• Performs physical cyclic stocktaking at all warehouses and lay down locations and investigates variances.• Prepare inventory adjustment sheets and forward though to immediate supervisor for review.• Prepares reports advising management of count discrepancies found by warehouse locations.• Performs audits and inspections in the data input area to ensure documentation is processed in an accurate and timely manner in accordance with policies and procedures.• Coordinates with Administration Coordinators to investigate and resolve negative stock-on-hand balances.• Performs physical inspection of Capitalized and Insurance items to ensure inventory is stored in an appropriate manner that protects its condition.• Checks material-in-transit reports to determine if inventory has been physically received but not yet acquitted.• Review warehouse non-action reports to monitor warehouse service level performance.• Recommends stock preservation to warehouse supervisors for items that require special storage requirements.• Coordinates with user departments to ensure that technical inspections are performed on repaired items prior to storage.• Control secure cyclic count records through centralized filing for all warehouse counts performed.• Other duties as assigned. What skills and experience do you need?• Tertiary degree in engineering, supply chain or equivalent;• Minimum 5 years of experience in procurement and logistics management in Mining/ EPC Industry with a minimum 3 of those years working in a similar position as Analyst Compliance (Stock Taking) in multi warehouse locations.• Previous experience in SAP would be preferable.• Excellent communication skills in English both verbal and written and computer literate. Please share your CV specifically by mentioning your detail experiences, responsibilities, and skills in accordance with the requirements needed for the position you applied. Send your application by email to [email protected] (not more than 1000kb with put the Job Title_Name (WHS) on your subject) no later than 5 Mar 2024.Only qualified, short-listed applicants will be contacted for furthers process Please be aware of certain frauds or misinformation regarding recruitment advertising on behalf of Amman.co.id We never ask for any payments whatsoever from applicants or candidates during the recruitment process. We never ask applicants or candidates to use specific travel agent services to make arrangements for transportation and accommodation during the recruitment process.

Position : Principal Community Relation AnalystLocation : Dompu, NTBRole Summary & Responsibility : As a Principal Community Relations Analyst, he/she will play a pivotal role in ensuring that Company operations align with community interests, particularly in regions affected by mining activities. He/she will be responsible for conducting social impact assessments to identify and mitigate potential negative effects on local communities. His/her expertise in management, conflict resolution, and understanding of pertinent laws and regulations will be crucial in fostering positive relationships and sustainable practices.Social Impact Assessment: Conduct thorough assessments to evaluate the potential social implications of mining operations on local communities. Identify key stakeholders and engage in meaningful dialogue to understand their concerns and needs.Mitigation Strategies: Develop comprehensive strategies to mitigate adverse effects on communities, including but not limited to environmental degradation, displacement, and socio-economic disruptions. Collaborate with relevant departments to implement these strategies effectively.Community Engagement: Establish and maintain strong relationships with community leaders, organizations, and residents. Facilitate regular communication channels to address grievances, gather feedback, and foster mutual understanding.Conflict Resolution: Act as a mediator in resolving conflicts between the company and community stakeholders. Employ diplomatic skills and negotiation techniques to find mutually beneficial solutions and prevent escalation of tensions.Compliance and Regulatory Adherence: Stay updated on local and national laws, regulations, and policies relevant to mining activities and community relations. Ensure that company practices align with legal requirements and industry standards.Training and Capacity Building: Provide training and guidance to internal teams on best practices for community engagement and social responsibility. Empower colleagues to understand and prioritize the needs of affected communities.Monitoring and Reporting: Establish monitoring mechanisms to track the progress of community relations initiatives and assess their impact. Prepare regular reports and presentations for management, stakeholders, and regulatory bodies as required.. Requirement :Bachelor's or Master's degree in Sociology, Anthropology, Social Science, or a related field. Advanced degree preferred.More than 8 years in experience dealing with extractive industry external/ community relations or similar.Proven experience in conducting social impact assessments within the context of mining or extractive industries.Strong understanding of community development principles, stakeholder engagement strategies, and conflict resolution techniques.Familiarity with local and national laws, regulations, and policies governing mining operations and community relations

Korespondensi dan Komunikasi: Menangani surat-menyurat, email, dan komunikasi internal maupun eksternal perusahaan dengan cara yang profesional dan efektif.

Pelamar harus memiliki KTP

1. Membuat Agenda Kantor
Pembuatan segala agenda kantor mencakup jadwal pertemuan rapat dengan anggota internal perusahaan atau pihak eksternal seperti klien dan supplier. Administrator kantor harus memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik untuk menunjang pekerjaan ini. Mereka harus berkomunikasi mengenai jadwal meeting, peralatan dan perlengkapan yang dibutuhkan, dan sebagainya.2. Mengelola DokumenDokumen merupakan aset berharga bagi perusahaan sehingga harus dikelola dengan tepat. Pengelolaan dokumen meliputi kegiatan pencatatan laporan keuangan, notula rapat, dan sebagainya. Untuk mengelola dokumen, administrator kantor harus memiliki kemampuan pengarsipan, pembukuan, dan riset.3. Mengurus Surat-MenyuratAdministrasi perkantoran juga bertanggung jawab dalam surat keluar dan menginput surat masuk. Ada banyak surat yang dibuat oleh administrator kantor, yaitu surat perintah kerja, surat domisili, surat pembelian, surat penjualan, surat perpanjangan kontrak, dan sebagainya.
Baca juga: Contoh Absensi Karyawan Harian Manual di Perusahaan4. Menginput DataInput atau entry data merupakan tugas administrasi perkantoran yang paling mendasar. Data dan informasi dalam bentuk formulir, non-dokumen, atau data multimedia (bentuk audio, foto, atau video) harus dimasukkan ke dalam aset perusahaan. Data ini sangat penting karena menyimpan informasi terkait konsumen atau klien sehingga harus dilakukan secara efektif dan efisien.5. Mengarsip DataData yang diinput kemudian diarsipkan agar tidak hilang. Data yang diarsipkan sangat berguna untuk pengembangan perusahaan agar lebih baik pada masa depan sekaligus memudahkan proses pengorganisasian data. Perusahaan pun harus menjamin keamanan data yang tersimpan di dalamnya supaya tidak bocor, apalagi data tersebut mengandung informasi pribadi dari pelanggan.
Baca juga: Pentingnya Digitalisasi Arsip Dalam Menunjang Proses Bisnis Berkembang6. Merekap DataPerusahaan juga harus melakukan rekapitulasi data yang masuk dan telah diarsip. Rekapitulasi data berguna supaya segala informasi yang disimpan dapat dibaca dan digunakan untuk keperluan perusahaan. Proses perekapan dan pengarsipan data harus dilakukan secara aman agar tidak hilang atau diakses oleh orang yang tak bertanggung jawab.7. Menerima Panggilan TeleponAdministrator kantor juga bertanggung jawab terhadap setiap panggilan telepon yang masuk. Keterampilan komunikasi yang baik diperlukan dalam tugas ini karena mereka menjadi penghubung antara penelepon (pihak eksternal) dan karyawan yang bekerja di dalamnya. Administrasi perkantoran juga menangani keluhan pelanggan apabila perusahaan belum memiliki divisi customer care atau customer service.8. Menyiapkan AkomodasiBeberapa kegiatan perusahaan juga membutuhkan akomodasi dalam prosesnya. Akomodasi ini berhubungan dengan penjadwalan agar tidak bertabrakan dengan kegiatan lain yang sedang dikerjakan. Contoh akomodasi tersebut meliputi tiket perjalanan dinas, penjadwalan kegiatan atau meeting di luar kantor, dan sebagainya.9. Melakukan Inventaris KantorPeralatan dan perlengkapan kantor juga menjadi tanggung jawab administrasi perkantoran. Oleh karena itu, administrator kantor harus membuat daftar inventaris mengenai barang yang keluar dan masuk. Tugas ini sangat penting dilakukan agar keuangan perusahaan lebih efisien dan semua peralatan yang tersedia dapat digunakan lebih maksimal.10. Membuat Laporan PekerjaanLaporan telah menjadi hal yang wajib dikerjakan oleh karyawan mana pun, termasuk administrator kantor. Laporan ini bisa menjadi pembanding antara pekerjaan yang ingin dikerjakan dan bentuk realisasinya. Pembuatan laporan biasanya dilakukan setiap bulan, kuartal, atau tahunnya. Administrasi perkantoran di perusahaan juga bisa berkembang apabila mengetahui evaluasi dari kegiatan pembuatan laporan ini.
Persyaratan minimum:
Tersedia jam fleksibel

Facility: Hybrid Working, Competitive Salary, Courses and Team learning
Job Description: At Bitlabs Academy we aim to transform lives through work-relevant Learning in Digital and Data. We teach the Indonesian young generation the skills to become Data Analysts, Scientists, Engineers, and Software Engineers as well as provide them the opportunity to experiment with their knowledge through Bitlabs Academy. Established in 2018, Bitlabs has been trusted by over 150.000+ students all over Indonesia and helped them work in national and multinational companies in Indonesia. Entering our 5th year, we were just rewarded as Best Data Science Bootcamp 2023 by Course Report, an international authority of coding and digital skills bootcamp. At Bitlabs, we believe that everyone deserves equal opportunities in education, and we aim to help individuals to #StayRelevantForTheFutureOfWork Responsibilities: As a COO Office Analyst, you will have the unique opportunity to work closely with our Chief Operating Officer and gain valuable insights into the day-to-day operations of a growing company. More specifically you will:Working together with the operations team or learning and development team in formulating improvement of the company product (boot camp).Assist in data analysis to support decision-making processes within the operations team and marketing team.Support the COO to synthesize different internal research and insights.Doing product and/or market research for ongoing and upcoming product ideas.Track and ensure the quality of project progress from the operations team and marketing team.Assist in the oversight and management of bootcamp development projects, ensuring they align with company strategic goals and are executed efficiently.Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.Having experience as a Lab Assistant/Mentor/Facilitator related to AI/Machine Learning/Data Science.Ability to think critically and analytically about curriculum development challenges.Analytical skills to analyze data and provide insights.Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced and dynamic team environment.Analytical and critical thinker with proficiency in data analysis tools, such as google data studio, etc Winner or finalist of a Business Competition is a plus. Our Values At Bitlabs Academy, we are committed to providing our team with a supportive and collaborative work environment, ongoing training and development opportunities, and a competitive compensation package. In Bitlabs, we cultivate cultures of: Excellence: to make better and make an impact on others' lives through education and continuously delivering work-relevant learning experiences Care: teamwork makes the dream work. We believe in bringing talented people together, winning together, and learning from each other Growth: the biggest investment you can do is invest in yourself. We support our team's growth with courses, team learnings, and sharing sessions (free access to all Bitlabs Learning Programs) Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted for the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up.

We are hiring a qualified Business Analyst to join our hospitality businesses (hotel and F&B). The Business Analyst will play a crucial role in providing data analysis, strategic insights, and recommendations to support our organization goals and decisions. (Kami sedang membutuhkan Bisnis Analis yang berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan bisnis Hotel dan F&B. Bisnis Analis akan memerankan peran penting dalam menyiapkan analisis data, konsep strategis, dan ide-ide rekomendasi untuk mensupport tujuan dan keputusan perusahaan kami) What You Will Do:Analyze market trends and customer preferences to identify opportunities for business growth and development. OrderOnline.id is a Social Commerce Enabler that provides a web-based app (an online store) and a management platform for online businesses and SMEs, enabling them to effectively and efficiently operate their online businesses. #SemuaBisaJualanOnline, reflects our commitment to empowering and assisting all online businesses in Indonesia to operate their businesses with an end-to-end solution. Requirements: 1. Bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as computer science, statistics, mathematics, or a related field, Master's degree preferred. 2. Proven experience (5 years) in a data analysis or management role, with demonstrated leadership skills. 3. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data sets and extract meaningful insights. 4. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. 5. Proficiency in data analysis tools and programming languages such as SQL, Python, R, etc. 6. Experience with data visualization tools such as Metabase, Tableau, Power BI, etc. 7. Knowledge of data management best practices and techniques. 8. Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks simultaneously. 9. Experience with agile methodologies and project management tools is a plus. 10. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing priorities.  Job description: 1. Provide effective leadership to the data team, including goal setting, performance management, and professional development. 2. Oversee the analysis and interpretation of data to extract valuable insights and inform business decisions. 3. Collaborate with various departments to identify opportunities for leveraging data to drive business growth and optimize performance. 4. Develop and implement data management processes to streamline operations and improve efficiency. 5. Ensure data quality and integrity by implementing quality assurance processes and conducting regular audits. 6. Identify areas for improvement in data analysis processes and tools, and implement solutions to enhance performance. 7. Promote a culture of continuous learning and innovation within the team by providing training and development opportunities. 8. Communicate effectively with stakeholders to understand their data needs and provide relevant insights and solutions. 9. Identify and mitigate risks related to data management and analysis.

Job Title: coo office analyst - learning management system product
Facility: Hybrid Working, Competitive Salary, Courses and Team learning
Job Description: At Bitlabs Academy we aim to transform lives through work-relevant Learning in Digital and Data. We teach the Indonesian young generation the skills to become Data Analysts, Scientists, Engineers, and Software Engineers as well as provide them the opportunity to experiment with their knowledge through Bitlabs Academy. Established in 2018, Bitlabs has been trusted by over 150.000+ students all over Indonesia and helped them work in national and multinational companies in Indonesia. Entering our 5th year, we were just rewarded as Best Data Science Bootcamp 2023 by Course Report, an international authority of coding and digital skills bootcamp. At Bitlabs, we believe that everyone deserves equal opportunities in education, and we aim to help individuals to #StayRelevantForTheFutureOfWork Responsibilities: As a COO Office Analyst, you will have the unique opportunity to work closely with our Chief Operating Officer and gain valuable insights into the day-to-day operations of a growing company. More specifically you will:Working together with the operations team and tech team in formulating improvement of the company product (learning management system).Assist in data analysis to support decision-making processes within the operations team and tech team.Support the COO to synthesize different internal research and insights.Doing product and/or market research for ongoing and upcoming product ideas.Track and ensure the quality of technical projects from the operations team and tech team.Assist in the oversight and management of technical projects, ensuring they align with company strategic goals and are executed efficiently.Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Management, or related field.Experience in software development projects or handling business process analysis, project/product management, system analysis, data analysis, or business analysis.Ability to think critically and analytically about complex technical challenges.Familiarity with software development processes and agile methodologies.Resourceful, with a knack for troubleshooting and problem resolution.Analytical skills to analyze data/systems and provide insights.Analytical and critical thinker with proficiency in data analysis tools, such as google data studio, etc  Our Values At Bitlabs Academy, we are committed to providing our team with a supportive and collaborative work environment, ongoing training and development opportunities, and a competitive compensation package. In Bitlabs, we cultivate cultures of: Excellence: to make better and make an impact on others' lives through education and continuously delivering work-relevant learning experiences Care: teamwork makes the dream work. We believe in bringing talented people together, winning together, and learning from each other Growth: the biggest investment you can do is invest in yourself. We support our team's growth with courses, team learnings, and sharing sessions (free access to all Bitlabs Learning Programs) Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted for the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up.

Job Title: senior equity research analyst (english or chinese)
Job Description: Responsibilities:1. As an Equity Research Analyst, you will play a crucial role in conducting in-depth research on companies, enabling a comprehensive understanding of the Indonesian market. Under the tutelage of accomplished private equity investors, you will refine your writing and logical thinking skills , preparing you for potential advancement to the role of a fund manager.2. Join the industry research group of the Company's Securities Research Institute, conduct in-depth research on all listed companies in a certain 1-2 industries, analyze and judge the industry competition pattern, and predict the future long-term development of the industry.3. Conduct on-site or telephone online surveys of listed companies, interview industry experts, senior industry funds and professional investors to build understanding of the industry and listed companies.Day to day task includes：-Craft meticulous research reports tailored for both retail and institutional investors within predetermined deadlines.-Conduct thorough company analysis through a combination of online sources and on-site surveys to extract unique insights.Qualifications:1. A graduate from a reputable university (Minimum GPA 3.2) with a major in finance, accounting, economics, or related field2. Over three years of hands-on experience and a solid theoretical foundation in the value research and assessment of listed companies, with a background of three or more years as a fund manager or industry and company researcher.3. Expertise in enterprise valuation methodologies, including a mastery of models such as DCF and DDM. Proficient in fundamental analysis of companies with a robust foundation in financial and economic analysis. Those who can use the Bloomberg system are preferred.4. Profound knowledge of industry analysis methodologies, demonstrating the ability to rapidly assess industries, make informed judgments on growth and development, and articulate critical points in industry assessments.5. Fluent in Chinese or English for effective communication, possessing polished presentation skills, and adept in utilizing tools such as Bloomberg and Microsoft Office.Demonstrate a commitment to excellence, uphold radical truthfulness, possess an open-minded approach, and exhibit strategic intelligence.6. Willingness to undergo comprehensive training for the development of advanced analytical thinking.7. Genuine interest in stock valuation and adept at reading annual reports.8. Willingness to work from our office in the PIK area.8. Possession of a minimum HSK 6 certification is a plus10. Pursue the excellence, being radical truthful, open minded and smart.

Job Description: Deskripsi Pekerjaan:Sebagai Staff Accounting, tanggung jawab utama Anda meliputi:Pemeliharaan Buku Besar: Memasukkan dan memeriksa transaksi ke dalam sistem akuntansi perusahaan untuk memastikan akurasi dan keteraturan data.Persiapan Laporan Keuangan: Menyiapkan laporan keuangan bulanan dan tahunan seperti neraca, laporan laba rugi, dan laporan arus kas.Analisis Data Keuangan: Menganalisis data keuangan untuk mengidentifikasi tren, kesalahan, dan ketidaksesuaian serta memberikan rekomendasi perbaikan.Pemantauan Kas: Memantau aliran kas perusahaan dan menyusun proyeksi kas untuk membantu manajemen dalam pengelolaan likuiditas.Pemenuhan Pajak: Memastikan kepatuhan perusahaan dengan peraturan perpajakan dan menyusun laporan pajak yang diperlukan.Kolaborasi Tim: Bekerja sama dengan tim keuangan dan departemen lainnya untuk memastikan kelancaran operasional dan pencapaian tujuan perusahaan.Kualifikasi Pekerjaan Gelar Sarjana (S1): Kandidat harus memiliki gelar sarjana dalam bidang akuntansi, keuangan, atau bidang terkait.Pemahaman Pajak: Memiliki pemahaman dasar yang kuat tentang peraturan perpajakan yang berlaku di wilayah atau negara tempat bekerja.Kemampuan Analitis: Kemampuan untuk menganalisis data keuangan, mengidentifikasi implikasi pajaknya, dan menyusun laporan pajak secara akurat.Keterampilan Komunikasi: Keterampilan komunikasi yang baik untuk menjelaskan konsep pajak kepada klien dan rekan kerja.Kerja Tim: Kemampuan untuk bekerja dalam tim dan berkolaborasi dengan berbagai pihak seperti tim akuntansi, manajemen, dan auditor pajak.Kepatuhan dan Integritas: Kesadaran akan kepatuhan terhadap peraturan perpajakan serta integritas dalam menjalankan pekerjaan.Kemampuan Teknologi: Pemahaman tentang penggunaan perangkat lunak akuntansi dan perangkat lunak pajak, serta kemampuan untuk mengelola data secara efisien.

Cambridge casual has three running factories in Java and the Head of Quality Assurance is responsible to manage to set the product quality standard from these factories. West Java, Indonesia Cambridge casual is a pioneer integrated furniture manufacturer committed to delivering high-quality products to our customers in the US market. With a focus on innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction, we continuously strive for excellence in our products and services. Position Overview:We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced QA Manager to join our team. The QA Manager will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of quality assurance within our manufacturing processes, ensuring that our products meet the highest standards of quality, safety, and customer satisfaction. Key Responsibilities:- Develop and implement quality assurance policies and procedures to ensure compliance with customer standard.- Establish and maintain quality control systems throughout the manufacturing process, from raw materials inspection to finished product testing.- Conduct regular audits and inspections to identify areas for improvement and implement corrective actions as necessary.- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including production, engineering, and procurement, to address quality issues and drive continuous improvement initiatives.- Manage and mentor a team of quality assurance professionals, providing guidance, training, and support as needed.- Analyze data and metrics to monitor product quality trends and performance, and develop strategies to enhance overall quality and efficiency.- Coordinate with external stakeholders, including suppliers and customers, to ensure compliance with quality standards and specifications.- Stay current with industry developments and best practices in quality assurance and incorporate them into our processes and procedures. Qualifications:- Bachelor's degree in engineering, manufacturing, quality management, or a related field; advanced degree preferred.- Minimum of ten years of experience in quality assurance or quality management roles within the furniture industry.- Strong knowledge of quality management systems, standards, and methodologies, such as ISO 9001 and Six Sigma.- Proven track record of implementing quality improvement initiatives and driving measurable results.- Excellent leadership and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate and collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.- Analytical mindset with the ability to analyze data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.- Strong organizational and project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines effectively.- Certification in quality management (e.g., ASQ Certified Quality Manager) is a plus. At Cambridge Casual, you'll have the opportunity to work with a dynamic team of professionals dedicated to excellence and innovation. We offer competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and opportunities for professional growth and development in a collaborative and supportive environment. If you are passionate about quality and ready to take on a challenging and rewarding role in a fast-paced manufacturing environment, we'd love to hear from you!

Job Description: KoolLogix Pte Ltd is a full-fledged Singapore company. The KoolLogix System is a row-cluster server rack heat removal solution, designed for high-density deployment, using a refrigerant-based loop thermosiphon heat transport circuit.It is therefore energy-efficient, with a considerably high Coefficient of Performance (CoP), able to lower data centre’s Power Usage Effectiveness (PUE), and Carbon Emission, and support client-user’s Sustainability (ESG) initiatives. OverviewAs a Solutions Sales Executive at the associate level, you will play an integral role in expanding our business growth in the Indonesian market. You will work under the guidance of the Chief of Representative KoolLogix Indonesia and use your understanding of our heat removal solutions for the data center industry to support sales initiatives. Your role will be vital in identifying new opportunities, nurturing client relationships, and contributing to achieving our sales objectives. Key Responsibilities:1. Sales Support:Assist in identifying, qualifying, and pursuing new sales opportunities to contribute to sales targets.Support the resolution of business issues for clients, contributing to solutions that ensure client success.Assist in upselling and cross-selling efforts to enhance the sales pipeline.Support the preparation and delivery of effective sales presentations to customers.Assist in managing accounts throughout the sales cycle, from prospecting to post-sales support. 2. Market Awareness:Assist in the analysis of strategic and new market segments.Support the implementation of local market sales strategies to maximize sales opportunities.Assist in monitoring competitor movements and market trends to inform sales strategies. 3. Collaboration:Collaborate with the sales team to implement and review the sales strategy and plan.Support efforts to build and strengthen networking with external business partners and key stakeholders to enhance sales leads and opportunities. 4. Technical Understanding:Develop and maintain an understanding of our technical solutions to effectively engage in business discussions with clients.Contribute to strategic and critical thinking to support the organization's rapid growth. Required Qualifications:Candidate must have experience work in a distributor company for these Brands Schneider, Vertiv, Stulz selling CRAC/CRAH before in Data Centre for at least 3 years’ experience with customers track records will be advantage.Prior experience in a sales-related role, preferably in the data center industry.Familiarity with the Indonesian market, including local customs and business practices.Strong communication and relationship-building skills.Ability to operate in a team-oriented environment.Interest in developing technical knowledge of heat removal solutions in the data centre industry.This position provides an exciting opportunity to be part of our expansion into a new market and to grow your career in sales. If you have the skills and experience, we're looking for, we would love to hear from you. Core Competencies:Passion to learn, grow and drive results.Solutions & Consultative Selling process to engage different client levels.Effective Communication and negotiation skills in resolving issues.Creative Thinking & Problem solving in managing team.Use of business model, Strategic thinking in Sales planning.Strong business acumen in sizing up opportunities and risks. Other Requirement:At least 1-4 years of related sales experience.Diploma or degree in related field.

PT Dana Purna Investama (DPI) didirikan oleh Dana Pensiun BCA  berdasarkan Akte Notaris DR. Fulgensius Jimmy nomor 123 tanggal 24 April 2007 untuk menjalankan kegiatan usaha dibidang jasa pengelola gedung, jasa pelatihan & ketrampilan tenaga kerja, dan jasa outsourcing.  Dengan sumber daya yang dimiliki, DPI berkomitmen membantu Pelanggan dalam mengelola fasilitas gedungnya dengan baik sehingga Pelanggan dapat fokus mengelola bisnis intinya.Meskipun DPI merupakan perusahaan yang relatif baru, namun dibawah manajemen yang telah berpengalaman dalam pengelolaan gedung, DPI terus berkembang dan semakin dipercaya untuk mengelola gedung milik perusahaan swasta maupun BUMN di seluruh Indonesia. Dengan dukungan finansial yang kuat dan tim pendukung yang profesional, DPI akan berusaha terus menjaga kepuasan pelanggan dan menjadi tolok ukur (Benchmarking) dalam industri pengelolaan gedung di Indonesia.
